mapper.sql: action_id AS actionId, action_type AS actionType, action_name AS actionName, action_desc AS actionDesc, action_class AS actionClass, is_effect AS isEffect, cre_user_id AS creUserId, cre_time AS creTime, remark
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T.ACTION_ID, T.ACTION_TYPE, T.ACTION_NAME, T.ACTION_DESC, T.ACTION_CLASS, T.IS_EFFECT, T.CRE_USER_ID, T.CRE_TIME, T.REMARK FROM rule_action_info T WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT DISTINCT A.ACTION_ID, A.ACTION_TYPE, A.ACTION_NAME, A.ACTION_DESC, A.ACTION_CLASS, A.IS_EFFECT, A.CRE_USER_ID, A.CRE_TIME, A.REMARK FROM rule_action_info A INNER JOIN rule_action_rule_rel AR ON AR.ACTION_ID = A.ACTION_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.IS_EFFECT = 1 AND AR.IS_EFFECT = 1 AND AR.RULE_ID = #{ruleId}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM rule_action_info A INNER JOIN rule_action_rule_rel AR ON AR.ACTION_ID = A.ACTION_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.IS_EFFECT = 1 AND AR.IS_EFFECT = 1 AND A.ACTION_TYPE = 1 AND AR.RULE_ID = #{ruleId}
SELECT a.*, p.action_param_id, p.param_identify, p.action_param_name FROM rule_action_info a ,rule_action_param_info p WHERE a.action_id = p.action_id AND a.action_id in (${ids})

SELECT a.*, p.action_param_id, p.param_identify, p.action_param_name FROM rule_action_info a ,rule_action_param_info p where p.action_id = a.action_id AND p.action_param_id IS NOT NULL
AND a.business_id = #{businessId}
